{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=EdgeRouter |revision=PoE (ERPoe-5) |asin=B00HXT8EUE |price=175 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=router |pwr_v=24-48 |pwr_amp=2.5-1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5020 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640ETTI-70G |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=cFeon |fla2_model=QH16-104HIP |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G084QF-BCE7 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, console port,, (RJ45),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC125A;;3;,,, Octal Buffer and Line Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LS244;;2;,,, 2.5A High Voltage Buck Regulator;Texas Instruments;LM5005;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi;uP1713;;1;,,, 3A Schottky Rectifier;Micro Commercial Components;SK310A;;1;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;2;,,, 60V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AON7446;;10;,,, 60V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AO4421;;10;,,, 1A, 200V Ultrafast Power Rectifier;ON Semi;MURA120;;10;,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;2; |flags=PoE switch |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.1;UBNT Build; ID: 4567941-g15e9b5d; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.13-UBNT;EdgeOS; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui_eth=DC:9F:DB }} {{TagLine|5-Port EdgeMAX Router with Passive Power over Ethernet}} :[https://www.ui.com/edgemax/edgerouter-poe/ Product page]
:[http://www.ubnt.com/downloads/guides/edgemax/EdgeOS_UG.pdf User's Guide] {{•}} [https://dl.ubnt.com/guides/edgemax/EdgeRouter_PoE_5_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide] :[http://www.ubnt.com/downloads/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_DS.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [http://dl.ubnt.com/firmwares/edgemax/v1.7.0/GPL.ER-e100.v1.7.0.4783374.tbz2 GPL Firmware Source]
{{See also|Cavium|MediaTek|Ubiquiti Networks}}
*[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter POE]] (ERPoe-5) - 5-Port Router with PoE :5x GbE (RJ45) ports, 24V/48V Passive PoE
*[http://wiki.ubnt.com/EdgeMAX_Wiki ''Ubiquiti Networks'' Wiki]
===See also=== :;[[Ubiquiti Networks]] • [https://www.ui.com/products/#edgemax ''EdgeMAX'' Router series] • [https://www.ui.com/edgemax/comparison/ Model comparison]
*[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter]] (ER-8) - 8-Port Router :8x GbE (RJ45) ports, [[Cavium]] CPU *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter LITE]] (ERLite-3) - 3-Port Gigabit Router :3x GbE (RJ45) ports, [[Cavium]] CPU *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter POE]] (ERPoe-5) - 5-Port Router with PoE :5x GbE (RJ45) ports, 24V/48V Passive PoE *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter PRO]] (ERPro-8) - 8-Port Router with 2 SFP/RJ45 Combo ports :6x GbE (RJ45) ports, 2x SFP/RJ45 Combo ports *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X]] (ER-X) - Advanced Gigabit Ethernet Router :5x GbE (RJ45) ports, 24V Passive PoE (In/Out), Passthrough *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X SFP]] (ER-X-SFP) - Advanced Gigabit Router with PoE and SFP :5x GbE (RJ45) ports, 1x SFP port, 24V Passive PoE *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 4]] (ER-4) - 4-Port Gigabit Router with 1 SFP Port :3x GbE (RJ45) ports, 1x SFP port *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 6P]] (ER-6P) - 6-Port Gigabit Router with PoE and 1 SFP Port :5x GbE (RJ45) ports, 1x SFP ports, PoE support on RJ45 ports *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 10X]] (ER-10X) - 10-Port Gigabit Router with PoE Flexibility :10x GbE (RJ45) ports, 24V Passive PoE, Passthrough *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 12]] (ER-12) - 10-Port Gigabit Router with PoE and 2 SFP Ports :10x GbE (RJ45) ports, 2x SFP ports, 24V Passive PoE, Passthrough *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 12P]] (ER-12P) - 10-Port Gigabit Router with PoE and 2 SFP Ports :10x GbE (RJ45) ports, 2x SFP ports, PoE support on RJ45 ports, Passthrough *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Infinity]] (ER-8-XG) - 10G SFP+ ''EdgeRouter'' Infinity Router :8x 10G SFP+ ports, 1x GbE (RJ45) port, Dual Power Supply
*[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgePoint]] R6 (EP-R6) - Intelligent WISP Control Point with FiberProtect :6x/8x GbE (RJ45) ports, 2x SFP ports, 54V/24V Passive PoE (EP‑R6, EP‑R8, EP‑S16) *[[Ubiquiti Networks airCube]] - ''airMAX'' Home Wi-Fi Access Point (2.4/5GHz) • [https://www.ui.com/accessories/aircube/ PPage] <!-- EdgeRouter (ER-8) EdgeRouter Pro (ERPro-8) EdgeRouter PoE (ERPoe-5) EdgeRouter Lite (ERLite-3) EdgeRouter X SFP (ER-X-SFP) EdgeRouter X (ER-X) EdgeRouter 4 (ER-4) EdgeRouter 6P (ER-6P) EdgeRouter Infinity (ER-8-XG) -->
